topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: Creating an Instance Snapshot

body.p: A snapshot is a new image based on a running instance. That snapshot can be used as the base for new instances.

section.title: Creating a snapshot

ol.li: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard.

Select the appropriate region and project.
For Denver and Tahoe deployments,you can work only in regionone

Based on whether you are working on a project or the domain:
Click the Admin dashboard, then the System panel, then the Instances tab.
Click the Project dashboard, then the Compute panel, then the Instances tab.
In the Instances table, for the instance you want to rebuild, click Edit Instance then Create Snapshot.
On the Create Snapshot tab, enter a name for the snapshot.

Click Create Snapshot to launch the instance.
A snapshot image is created on the Images list.

section.p: You can make the snapshot publicfor use in all projects in the domain and you can protect the imagefrom being deleted.
